TCName.name: orderCreation
TCName.SOH: select store_soh from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'
TCName.OM: select article_om from saap.zwowc_article_listing where matnr='art_no'

TCName.name: IBTCreation
TCName.SOH: select store_soh, store_soh_rand_wght from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'
TCName.OM: select article_om from saap.zwowc_article_listing where matnr='art_no'
TCName.SOHCALCULATION: select store_soh, STORE_SOH_RAND_WGHT from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'

TCName.name: orderOnReceipt
TCName.SOH1: select store_soh from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'
TCName.OM1: select article_om from saap.zwowc_article_listing where matnr='art_no'

TCName.name: ReceiveOrder
TCName.ReceivelinebyLine: select a.ebeln,convert(char(12),a.lfdat,103),convert(char(12),a.on_show_date,103),a.created_by,b.lifnr from zwowo_po_hdr a,ZWOWO_PO_HDR b where a.ebeln = b.ebeln and a.ebeln ='ord_no'

TCName.name: receiveOrderException
TCName.ReceivelinebyLine: select a.ebeln,convert(char(12),a.lfdat,103),convert(char(12),a.on_show_date,103),a.created_by,b.lifnr from zwowo_po_hdr a,ZWOWO_PO_HDR b where a.ebeln = b.ebeln and a.ebeln ='ord_no'

TCName.name: VendorinFull
TCName.vendorname: select partner_name,partner_no from zwowc_gs_vendor where partner_no = 'vendor_no'
TCName.TotCart: select sum(menge) from ZWOWO_PO_ITM where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.TotArt: select count(*) from ZWOWO_PO_ITM where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.TotArtRed: select count(*) from ZWOWO_PO_ITM where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.Artdet: select matnr, MENGE,MEINS from ZWOWO_PO_ITM where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.OM: select article_om from zwowo_po_itm where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.Base_UOM: select MEINS from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.SOH_Old: select store_soh, store_soh_rand_wght from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'
TCName.SOH_New: select store_soh, STORE_SOH_RAND_WGHT from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'

TCName.name: VendorinExceptionByNewOM
TCName.ReceiveFull: select a.ebeln,convert(char(12),a.lfdat,103),convert(char(12),a.on_show_date,103),b.lifnr from zwowo_po_hdr a,ZWOWO_PO_HDR b where a.ebeln = b.ebeln and a.ebeln ='ord_no'
TCName.ReceiveFull1: select a.ebeln,convert(char(12),a.lfdat,103),convert(char(12),a.on_show_date,103),a.created_by,b.lifnr from zwowo_po_hdr a,ZWOWO_PO_HDR b where a.ebeln = b.ebeln and a.ebeln ='ord_no'
TCName.vendorname: select partner_name,partner_no from zwowc_gs_vendor where partner_no = 'vendor_no'
TCName.TotCart: select sum(menge) from ZWOWO_PO_ITM where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.TotArt: select count(*) from ZWOWO_PO_ITM where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.TotArtRed: select count(*) from ZWOWO_PO_ITM where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.Artdet: select matnr, MENGE,MEINS from ZWOWO_PO_ITM where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.OM: select article_om from zwowo_po_itm where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.Base_UOM: select MEINS from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.Base_Ordqty: select MEINH from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where MATNR = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'N'
TCName.SOH_Old: select store_soh, store_soh_rand_wght from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'
TCName.SOH_New: select store_soh, STORE_SOH_RAND_WGHT from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'

TCName.name: OrderOnReceiptByNewOM
TCName.CheckDispArt: select ZAL.MATNR,ZAL.ARTICLE_OM, ZAL.IS_CPBD,ZAL.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, ZAM.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (ZAL.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) where ZAL.matnr = 'art_no'
TCName.CPBDArt: select MATNR from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE = 'art_no' and COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_OM = '24'
TCName.SOH1: select round(convert(double,store_soh),3), convert(int,round(store_soh_rand_wght,0)) from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'
TCName.OM1: select article_om from saap.zwowc_article_listing where matnr='art_no'
TCName.Base_UOM: select MEINS from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.Ran_OM: select pi_om from saap.zwowc_article_listing where matnr='art_no'

TCName.name: CancelVenOrd
TCName.OrdDetails: select a.ebeln,convert(char(12),a.lfdat,103),convert(char(12),a.on_show_date,103),b.lifnr from zwowo_po_hdr a,ZWOWO_PO_HDR b where a.ebeln = b.ebeln and a.ebeln ='ord_no'
TCName.OrdDetails1: select NAME1 || ' (' || SUPPLIER || ')' as supplierDet from ZWOWC_SUPPLIER_DETAILS where supplier = 'suppno'
TCName.OrdDetails2: select convert(int,sum(menge)),count(*) from ZWOWO_PO_ITM where ebeln = 'ordno'
TCName.Artdet: select matnr, convert(double,(MENGE)),MEINS from ZWOWO_PO_ITM where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.OM: select article_om from zwowo_po_itm where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.Base_UOM: select MEINS from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.Base_Ordqty: select MEINH from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where MATNR = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'N'

TCName.name: WHByException
TCName.OrdDetails: select vbeln,lifnr from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR where vbeln ='ord_no'
TCName.OrdDetails1: select NAME1 || ' (' || werks || ')' as supplierDet from ZWOWC_SITE_MASTER where werks = 'DC_no'
TCName.OrdDetails2: select count(distinct matnr), sum(LFIMG), sum(ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM where vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.OrdDetails3: SELECT DISTINCT A.DELIVERY AS "DELIVERY", SUM(A.ORDER_QUANTITY) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "TOTAL ORDER QUANTITY", MAX(convert(char(12), A.ON_SHOW_DATE, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "ON SHOW DATE", MAX(convert(char(12), A.LFDAT, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "DELIVERY DATE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS DELIVERY, LONH.MSG_TYPE AS STATUS, PITM.MATNR AS ARTICLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS ORDER_QUANTITY, PITM.MEINS AS ARTICLE_UOM, MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS ON_SHOW_DATE,MAX(PHDR.LFDAT) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS LFDAT, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLAG FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A;
TCName.Artdet1: SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS "DELIVERY",LONH.MSG_TYPE AS "STATUS",PITM.MATNR AS "ARTICLE",SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS "ORDER QUANTITY", PITM.MEINS AS "ARTICLE UOM",MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS "ON SHOW DATE",ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS "RANDOM WEIGHT FLAG", ZAL.PI_OM,ZAL.ARTICLE_OM, ZAL.IS_CPBD, ZAL.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, PHDR.TEMPERATURE_IND FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no';
TCName.Articleno: select a.matnr, a.MEINS,a.VRKME,sum(a.lfimg), sum(a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT), max(a.OM_SIZE),b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,b.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a JOIN zwowc_article_master b on a.matnr = b.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c on b.matnr = c.matnr group by a.matnr, a.meins, a.vbeln, a.VRKME,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,b.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG having a.matnr = 'art_no' and a.vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.Base_UOM: select MEINS from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.Ran_OM: select pi_om, pi_uom from saap.zwowc_article_listing where matnr='art_no'
TCName.OM: select article_om from zwowo_po_itm where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.SOH1: select store_soh, convert(int,round(store_soh_rand_wght,0)) from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'
TCName.Base_Ordqty: select MEINH from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where MATNR = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'N'

TCName.name: WHByExceptionTemp
TCName.OrdDetails: select vbeln,lifnr from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_HDR where vbeln ='ord_no'
TCName.OrdDetails1: select NAME1 || ' (' || werks || ')' as supplierDet from ZWOWC_SITE_MASTER where werks = 'DC_no'
TCName.OrdDetails2: select count(distinct matnr), sum(LFIMG), sum(ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT) from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM where vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.OrdDetails3: SELECT DISTINCT A.DELIVERY AS "DELIVERY", SUM(A.ORDER_QUANTITY) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "TOTAL ORDER QUANTITY", MAX(convert(char(12), A.ON_SHOW_DATE, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "ON SHOW DATE", MAX(convert(char(12), A.LFDAT, 103)) OVER (PARTITION BY A.DELIVERY) AS "DELIVERY DATE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS DELIVERY, LONH.MSG_TYPE AS STATUS, PITM.MATNR AS ARTICLE, SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS ORDER_QUANTITY, PITM.MEINS AS ARTICLE_UOM, MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS ON_SHOW_DATE,MAX(PHDR.LFDAT) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS LFDAT, ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLAG FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no' ) A;
TCName.Artdet1: SELECT DISTINCT LONH.VBELN AS "DELIVERY",LONH.MSG_TYPE AS "STATUS",PITM.MATNR AS "ARTICLE",SUM(PITM.MENGE) OVER (PARTITION BY PITM.MATNR, PITM.MEINS) AS "ORDER QUANTITY", PITM.MEINS AS "ARTICLE UOM",MAX(PHDR.ON_SHOW_DATE) OVER (PARTITION BY PHDR.EBELN) AS "ON SHOW DATE",ZAL.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG AS "RANDOM WEIGHT FLAG", ZAL.PI_OM,ZAL.ARTICLE_OM, ZAL.IS_CPBD, ZAL.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE, ZAM.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, PHDR.TEMPERATURE_IND FROM LOCAL_NOTIF_INFO_HDR LONH JOIN ZWOWO_PO_ITM PITM ON (LONH.ORDER_NO = PITM.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWO_PO_HDR PHDR ON (PITM.EBELN = PHDR.EBELN) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING ZAL ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAL.MATNR) JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER ZAM ON (PITM.MATNR = ZAM.MATNR) WHERE LONH.VBELN = 'ord_no';
TCName.Articleno: select a.matnr, a.MEINS,a.VRKME,sum(a.lfimg), sum(a.ZZDESPATCH_WEIGHT), max(a.OM_SIZE),b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,b.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG from ZWOWO_ORDER_NOTIF_ITM a JOIN zwowc_article_master b on a.matnr = b.matnr JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING c on b.matnr = c.matnr group by a.matnr, a.meins, a.vbeln, a.VRKME,b.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, c.IS_CPBD,b.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG having a.matnr = 'art_no' and a.vbeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.Base_UOM: select MEINS from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'Y'
TCName.Ran_OM: select pi_om, pi_uom from saap.zwowc_article_listing where matnr='art_no'
TCName.OM: select article_om from zwowo_po_itm where ebeln = 'ord_no'
TCName.SOH1: select store_soh, convert(int,round(store_soh_rand_wght,0)) from saap.local_wow_soh where article='art_no'
TCName.Base_Ordqty: select MEINH from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where MATNR = 'art_no' and base_uom_ind = 'N'
